page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE-K.MORRIS
page.content: I GOT UP AT 8.00AM.I GOT A WET FLANNEL AND WIPED MY FACE TO WAKE ME UP.THEN I HAD A WASH AND BRUSHED MY TEETH.THE NEXT THING I DID WAS TO GET DRESSED.I WENT DOWNSTAIRS TO HAVE MY BREAKFAST.I HAD TOAST AND A CUP OF COFFEE.I WATCHED TV.AM. TILL 9.45AM;THEN I WENT TO SCHOOL.AT SCHOOL WE CAME IN AND HAD THE REGISTER THEN WE DID NUMBER BONDS.NEXT MATHS. THE VICAR CAME TO TALK TO US ABOUT GOD.AFTER DINNER WE CAME IN AND DID SILENT READING.AFTER THAT WE PLAYED ROUNDERS BECAUSE THE OTHER HALF OF THE CLASS WAS DOING A MATHS TEST.WE DID CRAFT AFTER PLAY.I WAS TIE DYING,THEN I STARTED TO MAKE A FROG AND CUT OUT ITS SPOTS. WHEN I WENT HOME I HAD EGG,BEANS AND CHIPS AND A DRINK OF ORANGE.I WENT TO BED AT 9.00PM
